title: De Vuelta al Barrio
resume: It is the story of Pichón, a father of a family who has just been widowed, seeing the way to get their children forward, and Malena, who returns to his childhood home with his four children. During their youth they lived a romance and they arrived at the altar, but she decided to leave it moments before marrying and after twenty-five years, they meet again
